innhold.avsnitt: The earliest mothers can apply for parental benefit is the 22nd week of pregnancy. If you have been given a date for a planned C-section, use this as the date of delivery in your application.

You must apply at the latest within 3 months of when your parental benefit should have started to ensure that you do not lose any days of parental benefit. If you apply more than 3 months after your parental benefit should have started, you will lose days of parental benefit.
